Example function

```{r}
add_3 <- function(arg1) {
  new_value <- arg1 + 3
  return(new_value)
}

add_3(10)

```

Example for loop (with print outs to help you navigate what's going on! - thank you Lucy and Michael :D )

```{r}

x <- c(13, 14, 22, 100, 7, 4)
print(x)

for (i in 1:length(x)) {
    print(i)
    numn <- x[i]
    print(numn)
    numprint <- paste("n =", numn)
    print(numprint)
  }
```
